generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including the number "30" painted on the surface, indicating a speed limit.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and bordered by vegetation and buildings.
- building: Modern buildings with glass facades and brick structures are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are visible riding bicycles on the road.
- rider: The two individuals are riding bicycles, which classifies them as riders.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road and one is visible in the distance.
- pole: A pole with traffic signs is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are mounted on the pole on the right side of the road.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
